title: Hey, Lord Sesshomaru, if I mained.....
body: Xerath or Pantheon, how would you feel?

replies.body: only if your a baker irl
if you main pantheon rav is gonna go to your house and beat the shit out of you.
Those sure are funny ways to spell Aurelion Sol, Azir and Taliyah ; )
Pantheon hurts me on the insideeeeeeeeeeeee. Xerath is pretty chill tho. Both seem fun, you should go for it. That's my opinion you didn't ask for :)
